com.meli.api.coupon.service

Class CouponService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.meli.api.coupon.service.CouponService

  • @Service
public class CouponService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service to calculate the of items that can be purchased out of a favorite item list and a coupon amount.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ItemService itemService 
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> map 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CouponService(ItemService itemService) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private ResponseDTO calculate(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> items, java.lang.Float amount)
      This method calculates from the item list and the coupon amount, which items can be purchased trying to spend as much as possible of the coupon amount without exceeding it .
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSelectedItems(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> map, java.lang.Float[] prices, java.lang.String[] items, java.lang.Float amount)
      This method uses the map object populated by the getTotal() method to get the selected items
      ResponseDTO getSuggestedItems(RequestDTO request)
      This method returns a suggested list of item to be purchased and the total purchase with the coupon amount.
      private java.lang.Float getTotal(int pos, java.lang.Float amount, java.lang.Float[] prices)
      This recursive method calculates the total purchase based on the coupon amount and the price list of the favorite list items.

    • Method Detail

      • getSuggestedItems

        public ResponseDTO getSuggestedItems(RequestDTO request)
        This method returns a suggested list of item to be purchased and the total purchase with the coupon amount.
        Parameters:
        request - the user request, which is composed of the list of items to check and the coupon amount.
        Returns:
        ResponseDTO the API response, which is composed of the suggested list of items to purchase and the total purchase
        Throws:
        APIServiceException - When something was wrong during the process or the coupon amount is insufficient.

      • calculate

        private ResponseDTO calculate(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> items,
                              java.lang.Float amount)
        This method calculates from the item list and the coupon amount, which items can be purchased trying to spend as much as possible of the coupon amount without exceeding it .
        Parameters:
        items - user's favorite item list
        amount - coupon amount
        Returns:
        ResponseDTO the API response, which is composed of the suggested list of items to purchase and the total purchase

      • getTotal

        private java.lang.Float getTotal(int pos,
                                 java.lang.Float amount,
                                 java.lang.Float[] prices)
        This recursive method calculates the total purchase based on the coupon amount and the price list of the favorite list items. The idea is to get the maximum purchase value without exceeding the coupon amount.
        Parameters:
        pos - variable to iterate over the price list
        amount - coupon amount
        prices - price list
        Returns:
        the purchase total

      • getSelectedItems

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSelectedItems(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Float> map,
                                                          java.lang.Float[] prices,
                                                          java.lang.String[] items,
                                                          java.lang.Float amount)
        This method uses the map object populated by the getTotal() method to get the selected items
        Parameters:
        map - which has the keys and values to calculate the total purchase
        prices - item's price list
        items - user's favorite item list
        amount - coupon amount
        Returns:
        selected item list
